statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_management;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_management WHERE current_stock > 50;
SELECT inventory_id, product_name, forecasted_stock FROM inventory_management ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_management WHERE last_updated BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_management WHERE forecasted_stock < current_stock;
SELECT * FROM inventory_management ORDER BY product_name DESC, current_stock ASC
SELECT inventory_id, product_name FROM inventory_management WHERE current_stock > 50
SELECT MAX(current_stock), MIN(forecasted_stock) FROM inventory_management
SELECT product_name, last_updated FROM inventory_management WHERE current_stock < forecasted_stock
SELECT * FROM inventory_management WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels;
SELECT stock_quantity, last_updated, product_id FROM inventory_levels ORDER BY stock_quantity DESC;
SELECT model_name, parameters FROM forecasting_models WHERE model_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, stock_quantity FROM inventory_levels WHERE stock_quantity < 10;
SELECT * FROM forecasting_models ORDER BY model_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE stock_quantity > 100 ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT product_id, stock_quantity FROM inventory_levels WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT model_name, parameters->'learning_rate' AS learning_rate FROM forecasting_models WHERE model_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE stock_quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT product_id, stock_quantity, last_updated FROM inventory_levels WHERE product_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM Inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT item_name, unit_price FROM Inventory WHERE unit_price > 50;
SELECT item_name, quantity_sold, total_amount FROM Sales WHERE quantity_sold > 100;
SELECT item_name, forecasted_quantity FROM Forecast WHERE forecast_date = '2022-12-31';
SELECT item_name, quantity, unit_price FROM Inventory ORDER BY unit_price DESC, quantity ASC
SELECT item_name, quantity, total_amount FROM Inventory JOIN Sales ON Inventory.item_id = Sales.item_id WHERE total_amount > 100 ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT item_name, quantity, unit_price FROM Inventory WHERE quantity >= 10 AND unit_price < 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT item_name, unit_price*quantity AS total_value FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 5 AND unit_price BETWEEN 20 AND 50 ORDER BY total_value DESC
SELECT item_name, SUM(quantity_sold) AS total_quantity_sold FROM Sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY item_id ORDER BY total_quantity_sold DESC
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, forecasted_level FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_level > 50;
SELECT product_name, current_level AS available_quantity FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_level < 20;
SELECT model_name, algorithm_used FROM forecasting_models WHERE model_accuracy > 0.8 ORDER BY model_accuracy DESC;
SELECT product_id, sales_date, quantity_sold FROM sales_data WHERE quantity_sold BETWEEN 10 AND 100 ORDER BY sales_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels ORDER BY product_name ASC, current_level DESC
SELECT product_name, forecasted_level FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_level > 100 ORDER BY forecasted_level DESC
SELECT product_name, current_level, forecasted_level FROM inventory_levels WHERE forecasted_level < 50
SELECT * FROM stock_availability WHERE available_quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT s.product_id, s.available_quantity, f.model_name FROM stock_availability s JOIN forecasting_models f ON s.product_id = f.id
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT id, name, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT name, category, price FROM Products WHERE price < 100 ORDER BY category, name;
SELECT id, product_id, available_quantity FROM StockAvailability WHERE available_quantity > 0;
SELECT name, supplier_id FROM Products JOIN Suppliers ON Products.supplier_id = Suppliers.id;
SELECT * FROM InventoryLevels ORDER BY last_updated DESC, stock_quantity ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, stock_quantity FROM StockAvailability WHERE available_quantity > 0 AND last_updated > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY available_quantity DESC;
SELECT id, model_name, algorithm, accuracy FROM ForecastingModels WHERE accuracy >= 0.8 ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT p.name, p.category, s.name AS supplier_name FROM Products p JOIN Suppliers s ON p.supplier_id = s.id WHERE p.price BETWEEN 10 AND 50 ORDER BY p.name;
SELECT s.name AS supplier_name, s.location, s.email, p.name AS product_name, p.price FROM Suppliers s JOIN Products p ON s.id = p.supplier_id ORDER BY s.name, p.price DESC;
